sys_hub_flow.name: Business Card Request

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Record
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_73643360b08431107f44000c31ee6e63

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Table Name
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_73643360b08431107f44000c31ee6e63

sys_variable_value.value: You Business Card request has been approved

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 

Your Business Card request has been approved and will be sent to the printers.

 

Thank you.

sys_variable_value.value: Your Business Card request has been rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name your request has been rejected.

Please submit a new request.

 

Thank you

sys_variable_value.value: Your Business Cards have been shipped

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 

Your Business Cards have been shipped to Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Address.

Please be on look out for your cards in the mail.

 

Thank You

sys_variable_value.value: Your Business Cards have been shipped

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 

Your Business Cards have been shipped to Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Address.

Please be on look out for your cards in the mail.

 

Thank You

sys_variable_value.value: Your Business Card request has been rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name your request has been rejected.

Please submit a new request.

 

Thank you

sys_variable_value.value: You Business Card request has been approved

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 

Your Business Card request has been approved and will be sent to the printers.

 

Thank you.
